text: Sandra Anderson may refer to: *Sandra L. Anderson, airplane pilot with Northwest Airlines *Sandra Anderson, character in Wilby Wonderful *Sandra Anderson, character in Legion *Sandra Anderson, sailor in 2011 Dragon World Championships *Sandra Lynn Anderson, Citizens for Constitutional Freedom militant in the occupation of the Malheur National Wildlife Refuge *Sondra Locke (actually Sandra Anderson, 1944–2018), American actress
title: Sandra Anderson
